name: White Chocolate Gorp
author: LETSGGGO
summary: This is a wonderful holiday mix with everyone's favorite things in it! It's perfect served in a large bowl for snacking at holiday parties! You can substitute or add any ingredients you think will be good!
ingredients: 6 cups crispy rice cereal squares, e.g., Rice Chex ™
1 (12 ounce) package mini candy-coated chocolate pieces
directions: Melt chocolate in a large saucepan over low heat or in microwave until just until soft
Combine all the other ingredients in big roaster pan or bowl

Of course anything you like can be added or substituted-but this recipe is a great combination! Combine the crispy rice cereal squares, toasted oat cereal, pretzels, cashews and candy  in big roaster pan or bowl
Turn out on waxed paper and let cool
